report.title: The Wormwood Experiment
report.author: the double D's
report.bodytext: We have been interested in alternate consciousness experiences for awhile, and it is with this in mind, that we decided to try 'the wormwood experiment'. /n /n We took a small amount (a pinch, small fingers), and mixed it with cannabis. We smoked it in a bong. We felt immediately that we had stumbled into something very interesting and quite unlike anything we had previously experienced. /n /n The result, for us, was a very relaxed body stone. At the same time there was a sense of surging energy in our bodies. /n /n I saw what appeared to be some kind of shimmering beings, about the room where we had smoked. And something big. (scared the crap out of me for a second.) /n /n My accomplice experienced an ache in the area of her 'third eye'. She did not see anything out of the ordinary. /n /n We would like to caution anyone reading this that attempting to move while having inbibed these substances is very difficult. It took us 2 hours to get to the store (for munchies). Although we tried repeatedly just to get off the couches. /n /n Further experimentation is required. /n /n We read 'the Thudge' article and are considering experimenting with this obviously more potent substance. Our stones, were shorter lived and less pronounced, although many of the general descriptions sound similar.
